KTBBFC50.title: Heart
KTBBFC50.info: The muscular organ in the body that pumps blood through the circulatory system.

KTBBFC05.title: Cardiac Cycle
KTBBFC05.info: The sequence of events that occur during one complete heartbeat, including the contraction and relaxation of the heart chambers and the opening and closing of the heart valves.

KTBBFC15.title: Heart Beat
KTBBFC15.info: The rhythmic contraction and relaxation of the heart that produces the heartbeat.

KTBBFC52.title: Pulse Rate
KTBBFC52.info: The number of times the heart beats per minute, typically measured by counting the pulse at a peripheral artery.

KTBBFC53.title: Heart Rate
KTBBFC53.info: The number of times the heart beats per minute.

KTBBFC55.title: Cardiac Output
KTBBFC55.info: The amount of blood pumped by the heart per minute.

KTBBFC56.title: Structure Of Heart
KTBBFC56.info: The physical components and arrangement of tissues that make up the heart.

KTBBFC98.title: Electrocardiography (ECG)
KTBBFC98.info: A diagnostic test that records the electrical activity of the heart to detect any abnormalities in the heart's rhythm or structure.

KTBBFC99.title: Double Circulation
KTBBFC99.info: The circulation of blood through two separate circuits in the body: the pulmonary circulation, which carries blood between the heart and lungs, and the systemic circulation, which carries blood between the heart and rest of the body.

KTBBFC102.title: Circulatory Disorders
KTBBFC102.info: Diseases or conditions that affect the circulatory system, including the heart, blood vessels, and blood.

KTBBFC127.title: Regulation Of Cardiac Output
KTBBFC127.info: The mechanisms by which the body regulates the amount of blood pumped by the heart per minute.

KTBLM92.title: Cardiac Muscle
KTBLM92.info: Muscular tissue in the walls of the heart that contracts to pump blood throughout the body.

KTBBFC54.title: Heart Sound
KTBBFC54.info: The sounds heard during a heartbeat, caused by the closing of heart valves.

KTBBFC94.title: Working of Heart
KTBBFC94.info: The process by which the heart pumps blood throughout the body, consisting of the cardiac cycle and the regulation of cardiac output.

KTBBFC24.title: Component Of Blood Vascular System
KTBBFC24.info: The various structures that make up the circulatory system, including the heart, blood vessels, and blood.
